body_html:
Sorry, I meant:
$ ~/lab/bazel/bazel-bin/src/bazel build -j 1 --spawn_strategy=standalone -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

That is indeed weird that it can't open the mocha.git file...
